snippet: Robert Stolarik, a freelance photographer for The New York Times, was taking photos of a fight in the Bronx and suffered injuries in an encounter with the police.
abstract: Robert Stolarik, a freelance photographer for The New York Times, is arrested while on assignment in the Bronx; Stolarik, charged with obstructing government administration and resisting arrest, says that when he identified himself as a journalist for The Times after being asked to stop photographing an escalating street fight, he was struck by an officer and then dragged to the ground and kicked.
lead_paragraph: Robert Stolarik, a freelance photographer for The New York Times, was taking photos of a fight in the Bronx and suffered injuries in an encounter with the police.

headline.seo: Robert Stolarik, Times Photographer, Is Arrested While On Assignment in the Bronx
headline.main: Times Photographer Is Arrested on Assignment
headline.print_headline: Times Photographer Is Arrested on Assignment
